content: @fangu2017 @USChess @serbiachess1 @FIDE_chess They could, but the Chief Arbiters and Serbian federation are stating there is nothing wrong and these events fully comply with the Laws of Chess for hybrid events, so why should they? Probably the only way to stop these is by getting @FIDE_chess to stop rating hybrid events.
content_translation: @fangu2017 @USChess @serbiachess1 @FIDE_chess They could, but the Chief Arbiters and Serbian federation are stating there is nothing wrong and these events fully comply with the Laws of Chess for hybrid events, so why should they? Probably the only way to stop these is by getting @FIDE_chess to stop rating hybrid events.

content: If classical chess was dead it is probable that it was Carlsen’s ‘brute force’ drawn out end game style of play that was killing it. The #NepoDing match is surely proof that player style has much bearing on how entertaining the format is as a spectator sport. What a match!
content_translation: If classical chess was dead it is probable that it was Carlsen’s ‘brute force’ drawn out end game style of play that was killing it. The #NepoDing match is surely proof that player style has much bearing on how entertaining the format is as a spectator sport. What a match!

Yesterday's Game 9 ended in a draw! 

Game 10 between Grandmaster Ian Nepomniachtchi (world's No.2) and Chinese GM Ding Liren (No.3) will be played tomorrow, Sunday. 

The Russian super GM still leads 5-4.

content: En nuestra anterior encuesta sobre el Mundial de Ajedrez #NepoDing ganó Ding Liren con el 70% de votos a su favor. Hoy, de momento, vuelve a encabezar las preferencias de los votantes, pero ¡queda tiempo para más opiniones! ¡Esperamos vuestros votos!🤔
content_translation: In our previous World Chess poll #NepoDing, Ding Liren won with 70% of the votes in his favor. Today, for now, it is once again at the top of voters' preferences, but there is still time for more opinions! We look forward to your votes! 🤔

content: #DingLiren almost turned into a different person before our eyes in three weeks. He looked underconfident, shaky. Said he was depressed. Unhappy with hotel.
